reviews.text: 10/10 despuÃ©s de haber estado en Tailandia puedo decir que es un buen restaurante tailandÃ©sâ€¦ la comida buenÃ­sima, el sitio super acogedor y el personal muy simpÃ¡tico. 100% recomendable. Calidad/precio estÃ¡ muy bien. Todo fue 120$

Delicious! A fun opportunity to try new-to-me Thai dishes. One of our guests was trying Thai food for the first time and loved her pad Thai! I got the massaman curry, which is very cozy on a chilly evening. We recommend the pork jowl and the Thai iced teas :-)
Nice Thai ice tea!
Great Thai food loved the steamed fish blew us away!
Delicious food and excellent service! They have gluten free options too.
Authentic Thai food, one of THE BEST Thai restaurant in NYC
perfect food and great service!

Nice ambience and friendly staff, and the place gets packed during dinner time. Weâ€™re currently waiting for our orders to go and will update my review once we try them all:

Goong Sarong
Kor Moo Tod
Sai Tod
Khao Pad Pu
Classic Boat Noodle
Miang Salmon
Amazing food, amazing thai tea â™¡ will come back for more and you should too!
Awesome food, although it is a bit too salty. Waiters were very patient and friendly though, will definitely come back for more!

Good restaurant experience and friendly staff. My friends and I ordered khao soi, steak, minced salmon salad, and cashew dumplings.

I was asked to leave a review for a complimentary Thai tea.

We didnâ€™t have reservations on a weekend but the host quickly seated us. The order was taken very quickly and with a friendly smile. Food was served quickly. Very tasty. Would come again if I am in the neighborhood.
Love the vegan menu and the friendly service.

All dishes were delicious. The waiter rushed us throughout our stay. I had to order my entree and grab the chopstick the minute I sat down. There was no dessert despite early hour. They werenâ€™t able to split the check into three.
Food so tom YUMmyğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Great food! Iâ€™m from Thailand so I can attest to the fact that the food is very authentic. And great service too!
Delicious Thai food! Ordered the sukiyaki, Thai mama noodles and green curry fried rice. All the food was delicious and the service was amazing!
Green curry fried rice was the best Iâ€™ve had!
Food was great!
I've had the Kuay Tiew Nuer and was definitely delicious! The service is also very good!
The food was amazing as well as the service. I highly recommend this restaurant!
It was great! Such a great service.

Massaman Nong was absolutely delicious, and the appetizer Rak Bua Tod was also really good! The Thai tea was the most delicious Iâ€™ve had in NYC â€” perfectly balanced and refreshing. Highly recommend this place!
Good environment and delicious foodï½
2nd time here. Good environment and taste. Excellent service as before!
Delicious dishes and very quick service.
Stopped at this place for lunch. Fantastic service and authentic food on 10th avenue! Would recommend!

Everything about Valla Table is perfect! Iâ€™ve been to many Thai restaurants and this was easily the best Thai food Iâ€™ve ever had! Our server, May, was the best Iâ€™ve ever seen. She took the time to go over popular choices and her favorites. She even had the perfect recommendations for food and drinks for me. Overall service was amazing, and everyone was very professional and nice. Back to the food, as thatâ€™s the reason  most people go to a restaurant. The braised beed I got was so tender and delicious, the noodles were perfect, and it was all the perfect level of spicy. The drinks were all extremely delicious and mixed very well. The atmosphere is calm and very beautiful as well. Definitely coming back ASAP!

The staff was friendly and welcome! The food is delicious and looks exactly
As it does on the menu. The atmosphere is set in good mood. The dim lighting adds good ambiance and the music is not overbearing or obnoxious at all. Itâ€™s a great place overall!

My friend and I wandered in after seeing the front from across the street. The place was clean and smelled fantastic! Service was quick and polite; they took measures to ensure we had the best experience. The food was wonderful and blew past my expectations. Iâ€™ll be saving this location for the future.
Really loved this restaurant, the green beef curry with rice noodles was very good and unique, and so was the Thai iced tea. Didnâ€™t feel like I ever had to wait for the service as well!
Best Thai curry I had in a long time
Very convenient location for a pre-show dinner. Food seemed mostly average but the experience was good and the ambiance is bustling and fun.

Food was amazing, and was everything we were looking for. There were out of the pork belly on one dish, but the alternative was also good. They had an issue in the kitchen which had us wait a little longer, but they were great about resolving. Will definitely be back!
Great place to come to and hang out with friends! The food is delicious and we really had a great time here!
Amazing food and ambience!
Super refreshing pineapple juice! Will definitely come back
really great food!!!! Love it so much!
The vibe is very nice and the staff is very friendly. We ordered the crab appetizer, the pork belly and seafood hot pot.
Great food, appetizers in particular were very unique
Amazing Thai food!! Had pad see ew and thai tea and it was soooo delicious ğŸ˜‹â€¦
I had the Kao Soi and thai iced tea. Everything was delicious and the service was seamless! Looking forward to trying more dishes on their menu.
Many great choices but watch for the red jalapeÃ±os, if they tell you is hot is because it is ğŸ”¥ pls trust them ğŸ¥µotherwise great service

The food and service at Valla Table is excellent. I got Sai Tod (fried small intestine) and Tom Yum Mama which taste authentic and reminds me of Thailand! Totally recommend for anyone looking for authentic thai food within the area
The food is very good and the portions are generous. It has a warm atmosphere, perfect for a get-together with friends.
The food was phenomenal and shoutout to May who was the best to be around!

Iâ€™ve always liked Thai food, and I came here because of the great reviews. I really enjoyed trying some new Thai dishes that you donâ€™t usually find elsewhere. It was also nice to get a taste of Thailand here before actually visiting the country.
Everything was good- super authentic

Valla Table is an incredible Thai restaurant with an amazing atmosphere and beautiful Thai-themed dÃ©cor. The lighting sets the perfect mood, and our server May provided some of the best service Iâ€™ve ever had, so friendly and attentive. The Pad Thai was absolutely delicious, bursting with flavor and perfectly cooked. Highly recommend this spot for anyone who loves authentic Thai food and great vibes!

Had a great experience today at Valla Table. The seats are very comfy. Low lighting and beautiful decor. Very nice cups of water. I ordered the Pad Ke Mao trying to get something spicy. It was a good level of spice and very amazingly fast service. All topped off with very friendly and welcoming service from May and the rest of the team here! They run a tight ship and you can feel the care that goes into the service here.
